amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to add the term "disproportionately exposed communities" to "disadvantaged communities".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to add the term "disproportionately exposed communities" to "disadvantaged communities".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. Tlaib.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tlaib amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
